page.title: 09DAY TIME ACTIVITIES
page.content:
In the morning some people were quite lazy and they would just sit there and read the news paper.Most people had to work but a few read books, watched videos, gardened and minded children.
Most people ate lunch between 12.00 to 12.30.
The most common food was sandwiches and rolls, then chips with something, just chips and beans on toast.
Fewer people were at work, or at school in the afernoon than they were in the morning.Perhaps they worked part time and children went to nursery school. Most people did their housework in the morning.
